long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Pizza Tower" for Chrome Extension is an exciting idle clicker game that puts you in charge of managing a pizza business. In this game, your goal is to upgrade and expand your pizza tower by adding new floors and improving each individual floor. As you progress, you can also enhance your operations by hiring more delivery drivers to increase efficiency.

The gameplay revolves around manually sending the elevator to each floor to pick up pizzas for delivery. You'll need to strategize and optimize your operations to ensure smooth and timely pizza deliveries. By earning money from successful deliveries, you can invest in upgrades to make your pizza business even more profitable.

With its addictive clicker mechanics and strategic gameplay, "Pizza Tower" offers a fun and engaging experience. Best of all, you can play this game for free on the unblockedgames.ee website, allowing you to enjoy it without any restrictions. So, get ready to embark on a pizza-filled adventure and become a successful pizza tycoon in "Pizza Tower"!
